summary: SKY Standalone Girls adds 5 standalone followers: Jaune, Violette, Azul, Rossa and Midori. 7 body options. Single esp.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][left][size=6][b][/b][/size][/left][/font][center][font=Times New Roman][size=6][b][img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2le4az7.jpg[/img]
[color=#ff7700]Description [/color]
[/b][/size][size=1]_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/size]
[size=2]SKY Standalone Girls, are 5 followers all Marriageable and Essential, and will level with the Player, up to level 150. All in a single esp.

[img]http://i60.tinypic.com/5euxjr.jpg[/img]
[/size]
[color=#ffe599][size=5][b]Jaune the Nord[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#fce5cd][b]Fighting Style[/b]- Warrior
[b]Perks[/b]-Muffled Movement, Savage Strike, Matching set, Custom fit, Fighting Stance, Stability and Armsman.[/color]
[b][size=5]Midori the Elf[/size][/b]
[color=#d9ead3][b]Fighting Style[/b]- Conjuration/Destruction Magic
[b]Perks[/b]-Muffled Movement, Conjuration Adept, Avoid Death, Restoration Apprentice,  Duel Casting, and Destruction Adept. [/color]
[size=5][b]Azul the Elf[/b][/size]
[color=#c9daf8][b]Fighting Style[/b]- Archer
[b]Perks[/b]-Muffled Movement, Avoid Death, Over Draw, Deflect Arrows, Powershot, Deadly aim, Critical Shot and Ranger.[/color]
[size=5][b]Violette the Breton[/b][/size]
[color=#d9d2e9][b]Fighting Style[/b]- Battlemage
[b]Perks[/b]- Muffles Movement, Destruction Adept, Avoid Death, Respite, Light foot, Back stab, Assassin's Blade and Bladesman.[/color]
[b][size=5]Rossa the Imperial Vampire[/size][/b]
[color=#dbb0a7][b]Fighting Style[/b]-Necromancer
[b]Perks[/b]-Avoid death, Conjuration Dual Casting, Magic Resistance, Summoner  Muffled Movement and Stealth.[/color]

[b]Body Options:[/b][size=2] CBBE, UNP, SeveNBase, UNPB, CBBE BBP, SeveNBase BBP, and UNPB BBP.[/size]

[color=#ff7700][size=6][b]Where Are They?[/b][/size][/color]
[size=1]____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/size]

[size=3]I placed them in the [b]Bee and Barb in Riften.[/b] If you are not happy with this location, there are College of WinterHold and Dragonsreach options available.[/size]

[b][color=#ff7700][size=6]Notes[/size][/color][/b]
[size=1]____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/size]
[size=3]I love seeing pictures of people using my followers, so user photos are greatly appreciated. As well as endorsements if you enjoy the mod.  Their skin tone is not tinted, it may seem like that in the main photo because I changed the color levels. I will be adding a non-warpaint option in a few days. This mod is not lore friendly, if you don't like it, don't download it.[/size]

[size=6][b][color=#ff7700]Installation[/color]
[/b][/size][size=1]____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/size]
[size=3]Download and install with NMM or manually download and unpack the file and then move the “data” folder to your Skyrim data folder. This mod has a single esp. This mod is not made for a torrented game, and If you have any problems using it with a torrented game, I will not provide support.[/size]

[color=#ff7700][size=6][b]Uninstallation[/b][/size][/color]
[size=2]_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/size]

[size=3]Uninstall with NMM or manually delete all the files that came in the “data” folder listed in the mod.[/size]


[size=6][b][color=#ff7700]Credits[/color]
[/b][/size][size=1]_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/size]
dimon99 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Unp Body
[/url]Caliente for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Cbbe Body
[/url]Crosscrusade, DeMoNhUnTeR1986 , Sevennity for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase Body
[/url]Blessed Redux Project team for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNPB Body
[/url]HelloSanta for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures[/url] 
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?]KS hairdo's[/url]
TairenSoul for the beautiful Warpaints <3
[/size]LogRaam for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
nevenbridge81 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url]
zzjay for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD
[/url]AlexSlesh for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31926/?]CBBE BBP TBBP body
[/url]Aipex8 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38829/?]BVFE Better Vampire Fangs & Eyes[/url]
